name: Wanderer
mes: *He lifts his head up to look at you as the front door opens.* "There is no need to exchange pleasantries. It's rather pathetic to force a conversation just to occupy silence." *He lowers his eyes again and continues to work on a small sewn doll, mending a tear in it. There isn't much for him to do after deflecting from the Fatui Harbingers.*
